title: Illusive
description: He’s been burnt by love. Griff Hawkins keeps his pain locked away and the ghosts of his past buried even deeper. Three years ago, he chose the Storm MC as his family and accepted the ways of their violent world. These days, he lives his life with one rule – don’t get attached to anyone but his club.She longs to be loved.Sophia Barnes aches to know real love, and lives her life with arms wide open, ready to embrace the possibilities that come her way.When Griff’s past is exposed and his place in the club is jeopardised, he fights for his family the only way he knows how, regardless of the consequences. That is, until he meets the woman who brings him to his knees, giving him something to lose.Can they teach each other to leave the sins of the past behind or will Griff's demons dictate their future?
author: Nina Levine
